WordPress Website Owner? Check Out my WordPress Site Review Service

Recently I launched a WordPress website review service on WP Mayor, and I thought it would also be a good idea to let you know as well. I honestly feel that this service can help you take the next step in improving your WordPress website and get the results you wish for.

For only $600, you will receive a PDF report, compiled fully manually, that will highlight the various areas that can be improved in your site.

This is the most comprehensive report available on the market today. We will review every aspect of your site, as we believe that all elements are important to build a successful online presence, not only SEO or speed.

Here’s what you can expect the PDF report to include:

  • Design
    Tackling usability, design trends, use of imagery and typography, etc.
  • Content 
    Analyzing your content structure, searchability of the site, and more.
  • Theme Code
    Is your theme well-coded? Is it efficient? How does the site look on mobile devices?
  • SEO
    A complete SEO analysis. Analyzing semantics, permalink structure, site maps etc.
  • Plugins
    What plugins are you using? Are they necessary? Do they perform well? Any alternatives?
  • Speed
    How does your site fare in speed tests? What can you do to squeeze more performance out of your server?
  • Conversion
    Every site should be all about conversion. Your site/blog exists for a purpose, are you fulfilling that purpose? How can you improve your CTA, email subscribers, social media presence, etc?

The report will not only be a passive description of our observation, but will also include a clear list of actions you should take in order to improve the weak aspects of your website.

Best of all, everything will be explained in a clear language you can understand. The report won’t be loaded with jargon but will contain actionable information you can use right away.

Order a WordPress website review
